prompt:
The living room bore all the gentle scars of daily life. Pushed
up against the wall, a sofa, softened by years of conversation and afternoon naps. Next to
it, a coffee table, cluttered yet comforting, held a stack of books and a half-empty mug.
Photographs lined shelves, capturing smiling faces and faded vacations. In the middle of the room - a large pile of LEGO bricks, hazardous to any family member brave enough to walk around barefoot.
